knimeNode.name: SVN SCM
knimeNode.shortDescription: This plug-in reads metrics related to selected project stored in SVN repository.

fullDescription.intro:
Knime plugin to read commits metrics from
- svn repository log file or online svn repository
fullDescription.option:
SVN XML log file to load or web path to repository
Example :
local:
- file : (C:\repo\app\log.xml)
web:
- anonymous access : (http://svn/app/trunk)
- secured access : (http://svn/app/trunk;login;password)

marker type that you're looking at
Example :
- #21 or #bugfix

Package name (local xml) or Project directory (online repository)
Example :
- local (java class namespace):
* (org.*)
- web (repository path to directory):
* single directory (\tag\org\)
* multi directory (\tag\org\;\trunk\org\)

ports.outPort: Table with svn commit logs data
